free: #e I live in Namasia.
#c 我是那瑪夏的人。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e In my family, my name is Ka’angiana Mu’u.
#c 我在家族的地裡,我叫Ka’angiana Mu’u。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e That’s it. I was born here.
#c 就這樣我是在這裡出生的。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Later, I grew up. I went to school.
#c 後來長大了,我有去上學。
#n takitutura 學校, 老師。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e At that time, I just started to learn writing.
#c 那時候剛剛開始寫字。
#n campe 剛剛開始

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e First grade.
#c 一年級。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e At that time, I went home.
#c 那時候,我回家。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e My mother sat there.
#c 我媽媽在那邊坐下
#n tupur-a 坐下!

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I immediately took those clothes up and hide them.
#c 我馬上把衣服拿起來又藏起來

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I tucked thoes clothes into my mother’s breast.
#c 我就把衣服捆在媽媽的胸部。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e That’s all
#c 就這樣。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I had grown up, my father who has passed away took me into the mountains.
#c 我已經增長了,長大了,我過去的爸爸帶著我到山上。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e At that time, my father always took me to the mountains.
#c 那個時候我爸爸一直帶我去山上。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e My father said ‘Sit here. See how I make the traps for big animals.
#c 我爸爸叫我在這邊坐下,說:「注意看我怎麼做大野獸的陷阱。」

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I sat there for a while. My father kept making traps.
#c 我一直在那邊坐很久,我爸爸一直在做陷阱。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e We stayed there for three days. As we came back to there, ‘Wow! One muntjac.’ The muntjac bleated.
#c 在那邊住三天,我們回到那邊. 哎呀! 一隻山羌。「嘎、嘎、嘎」山羌這樣叫。
#n vʉrʉgʉngʉna 夜晚;nuvana 晚上;s<in>-pusan 過兩天

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then I was happy for catching a muntjac.
#c 就這樣，我心裡很高興還有套到的(山羌)。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Dad was kept attacking its head until it died.
#c 爸爸一直打他的頭,直到打死。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then, we went home.
#c 就這樣,我們就回家。

free: #e In the past, after we Kanakanavu people finished hunting, we went home calling our neighbors to come to eat the meat my father had caught.
#c 以前我們Kanakanavu人,當打獵完回家的時候,我們叫每一個家都來吃一吃我過去的爸爸套到的。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then, I more understood the things.
#c 我比較懂了。
#n taku-tavarʉ’ʉ 懂了

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I understood.
#c 我懂了。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e At that time, as I know things more, my father became aged.
#c 當我比較懂事了,我的爸爸就比較老一點。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I went mountains making traps by myself.
#c 那時候就自己去山上做套。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e After ten days, I went back there. I caught a goat there!
#c 過了十天以後，我回去那，在那邊我套到山羊。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then I hit its head.
#c 然後我打他的頭。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I hit its head.
#c 我打他的頭。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I could not carry it.
#c 我背不動。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e However, I knew that I had to askave the hide of the boar first, so that I could carry it with the mesh bag easily.
#c 那時候我知道我要先剝皮, 這樣的話比較好用背網背。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I caught a goat. I took off its hide firstly. Then I went home. ‘You caught a goat!’ my parents said to me happily.
#c 打到一個山羊,把皮先拿掉,就這樣回家了,他的爸媽看到他說,你打到了

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then I entered the army.
#c 就這樣我就去部隊。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then I became strong.
#c 我的身體就那樣(有力氣)。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Just like this, we Kanakanavu are called liuxi because of the river.
#c 就這樣,我們在楠梓仙溪這邊,我們卡那卡那富,就被叫做六溪。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then I caught a deer.
#c 我就套了山鹿。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Oops! The deer was quite big!
#c 哇塞！山鹿很大！

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I did not know how to move it, so I killed it.
#c 不知道要怎麼樣搬，就用殺的。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then I went home and told people that.
#c 我就回家去跟人說。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I gave money to that person because I could not carry it.
#c 那個人我給他零錢，因為我背不動山鹿。

meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

#c 就這樣,我們回家。

meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e It was good that money was big.
#c 那個時候還好錢還比較大。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e After four days, I went back there to see the traps. I caught a male boar.
#c 然後四天後，我套到公山豬。
#n itina 母山豬

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I caught a male boar. It looks frightening!
#c 我套到一隻公山豬。牠非常嚇人。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Why I felt afraid?
#c 我為什麼會怕?

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e If the teeth of the boar grow outward, it will not be terrifying.
#c 如果山豬的牙齒往外翻,那它不可怕。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e If the teeth of the boar protruded out around its mouth, that will be the most horrible one.
#c 如果牙齒只有在嘴巴那裏凸出來,那個最可怕

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then I stabbed that boar.
#c 就那樣,我刺那山豬。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I stabbed that boar.
#c 我刺那山豬。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then it died.
#c 就死了。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I could not carry it.
#c 我又搬不動。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I went home.
#c 我又回家了。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I talked to a person and had him carry the boar.
#c 我和人說話,叫他背。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I sold the boar, and I gave money to the person who carried it.
#c 山豬拿去賣,然後我把錢給背的人。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e After four days, I went back there again to see my traps.
#c 就這樣，過四天我又回去那邊，去看我的套。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e There was only one trap I made.
#c 只有一個我做的套。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I saw around, but I didn’t see the boar trap.
#c 我那裏到處看,沒有山豬套。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I cut the tree.
#c 我砍樹。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #e I cut the tree, and tucked the spear into the earth. But I got the wrong way.
#c 我砍樹,我把矛刺在地下，但是我走錯地方了。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Actually, I was above the boar, because the boar was below.
#c 其實說真的,我本來在上面,因為山豬在下面。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e I went to see the trap. It became round.
#c 我去看套。是圓圓的了。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e The boar showed up. I stabbed it.
#c 山豬出現,我刺牠。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Then, the rope broke.
#c 就這樣,繩子斷了。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e The rope passed by my leg.
#c 經過我的腿。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e Luckily, I was not injured. It just touched my body and my pants.
#c 還好沒有(受傷)。只是碰到我的身體,我的褲子。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁成, Mu'u Ka'angena, male, 1947-8-9

free: #e The pants was torn.
#c 褲子破了。
